message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $120 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. While I believe the product is worth more, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $135?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $125 for the product.
